title: updating dynasty Ahri?
body: Will this skin ever get updated? cause right now it's more like Dy-NASTY Ahri.

replies.body: {{champion:516}} I now like you less. I did not think that was possible.

> [{quoted}](name=Nik Nikerson,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=QaWdQQJn,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-09-02T00:26:07.574+0000)
>
> {{champion:516}} I now like you less. I did not think that was possible.

can you guess how many fucks I give?

Sigh. You made a terrible joke. What I said is Ornn's response in game to a joke.

And I'm going to guess.... 4? You give four fucks.

watcha mean, ahri isnt top tier anymore. Buff pls. Top tier = most attention. Ahri is B tier, Riot y you keep my fox girl weak ;(

Riot isnt giving ahri any attention though. Because attention = buffs. If riot buffs now much more will buy her skin.
